infos.info: The shows grouped under this title by Dunning include: - 6/3-8/26/45 - The Chase and Sanborn Show - 3/22-5/9/46 - Spike's at the Troc - 10/3/47-12/24/48 - Spotlight Revue - 1/2-6/25/49 - The Spike Jones Show
